About Me

I have been developing software for the last 3 years. In the process of development I keep a few principles in order to provide flexible and reliable application using the best known practices: simplicity, easy-maintenance and extensibility. My primary field of work is a backend part of web app is written in Java. Also I have experience in the development of client part in the form of single page app (javascript) or android app. I am here to apply my knowledge and experience to make your applications existing and working like a charm..
